If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature

**What happened**:
I've tried to switch two Istio ingressgateways in different K8S clusters (in the same AWS region) to NLB loadbalancers, but receive error:

> error processing service istio-system/istio-ingressgateway (will retry): failed to ensure load balancer for service istio-system/istio-ingressgateway: Error creating load balancer target group: "DuplicateTargetGroupName: A target group with the same name 'k8s-tg-9ff6919e87f45-80-31380' exists, but with different settings

**What you expected to happen**:
Second loadbalancer's targetgroups created successfully.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
Create two K8S clusters in the same AWS region. Create in each cluster service backed by NLB loadbalancer with the same namespace/servicename and ports combination.

**Anything else we need to know?**:
Problem is related to target group name calculation in function createTargetName:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/bcc23dfdc1620a2bbe840d62b739bcd1bda260b7/pkg/cloudprovider/providers/aws/aws_loadbalancer.go#L330-L333
Names for same combination of namespace/servicename (istio-system/istio-ingressgateway) and ports in different clusters in same region will generate identical names for target groups. 

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 1.11.2
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: AWS
- Install tools: kops

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: It is impossible to deploy identical NLB backed service in two different K8S clusters in same AWS region
